title: HomeKit Weekly: Regardless of your feelings on essential oils, Meross’ new oil diffuser is beneficial for dry winter months
content:
When it comes to oil diffusers, some people think they’ll solve the world’s problems and others believe they are humidifiers that smell nice. I fall in the latter category, but we still have multiple products around our house. We’ve tried several HomeKit options in the past, and while they technically worked well the overall appearance of them left a bit to be desired. The new brings a much better-looking option to this category of products. Let’s dive into how it works.
